headline: Is International Paper a 2025 Value Opportunity After Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: If you are wondering whether International Paper is quietly becoming a value opportunity while the market looks the other way, this article will walk through whether the current price really makes sense. The stock recently closed at $38.60, edging up 0.2% over the last week and 6.1% over the past month, even though it is still down 27.4% year to date and 26.2% over the last year. This mix often signals shifting market expectations. Those moves come as investors refocus on how cyclical...
